text: Sakharpa is a small village in the Ratnagiri district of the state of Maharashtra, India. It is on the bank of a river named "Kajlali". Sakharpa is about from Devrukh which is its taluka headquarters. The national highway NH 166 runs through this village. Sahyadri College Of Arts & Commerce is located here. == References == Category:Villages in India Category:Settlements in Maharashtra
title: Sakharpa
